fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Taxation, Single market, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Central Bank of Cyprus Directives, CRD, BRRD, AML, MIFID II, EU Directives and Regulations, Taxation, Market Abuse, GDPR
organisation_name: BANK OF CYPRUS PUBLIC CO. LTD (BOC)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Cyprus Employers and Industrialists Federation, Association of Cyprus Banks, Cyprus Advertisees Association, Cyprus Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Transparency International, Business Integrity Forum
goals__remit:
We strive to keep individuals and their problems and concerns, our focal point. Acknowledging our role as the largest financial institution of the country and a pillar of society, we provide support to social groups in need, under two pillars of action: Health and Education (BOC Oncology Center, BOC Cultural Fountation etc) 
 
We continue to deliver on our strategic objectives of becoming a stronger, more focused institution capable of further supporting the recovery of Cyprus and capable of delivering appropriate shareholder returns over the medium term.
relevant_communication:
Throughout the years the Bank has contributed to social progress and prosperity. Our corporate culture is keenly aligned with a sense of responsibility towards our customers, our staff, our shareholders and the extensive network of stakeholders. Maintaining a high level of professionalism and in line with the responsibilities entailed in our role as industry leader, we continue to create value for all our stakeholders. 
CSR Report
